auth.rpmtw_platform_mod.status.failed:
Login failed, please try again!
If it still fails, please go to RPMTW Discord and ask
https://discord.gg/5xApZtgV2u
auth.rpmtw_platform_mod.status.success: Login successfully, you can now close this screen, go back to the game and enjoy the game!
command.rpmtw_platform_mod.replyCosmicMe: Failed to got the cosmic chat message.
config.rpmtw_platform_mod.option.cosmicC: Minecraft account is used by default if you are not logged in to your RPMTW account
If disabled, it will override and disable other cosmic chat options.
Whether to show shortcut button of cosmic chat in the chat screen.
The nickname of the player in cosmic chat.
config.rpmtw_platform_mod.option.transla: Automatically switch the game language to a language supported by RPMTranslator when starting the game.
Machine translation is used to translate text if human translation is not available.
Additional display of unlocalized content, will not work if the game language is American English.
Automatic translation of item names and descriptions in the background using the machine translation function.
config.rpmtw_platform_mod.title: RPMTW Platform Config
cosmicChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.button.sen: Sending messages to the vastness of the cosmos to communicate with creatures from other planets.
cosmicChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.gui.eula.s: By using the cosmic chat system, you agree to the following terms.
cosmicChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.gui.eula.t: - This feature is linked to Discord, so please follow the Discord User Terms of Service.
- You are not allowed to use any form of harassment in the message, or use any means to attack the cosmic chat server.
- We will collect your UUID/IP for verification and ban account purposes only.
- We may change these terms and conditions at any time (to view the latest version, please go to the RPMTW official website).
《RPMTW Cosmic chat system end-user license agreement》
Please enter the message you want to send.
cosmicChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.gui.send: Send message to cosmic chat system
cosmicChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.status.ban: No message can be sent because your IP has been banned.
cosmicChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.status.phi: The message cannot be sent because the system detects that the message contains a suspicious link.
cosmicChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.status.una: The message cannot be sent, probably because it is a pirated account or the certificate data is processed incorrectly, please try again.
cosmicChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.title: Cosmic Chat
machineTranslation.rpmtw_platform_mod.st: The connection to Google Translate Server has exceeded the rate limit (429), please try again later.
Exception error occurred, status code: %d, please try again later.
